title: Professional Development Program for Enhancing Instructional Design Expertise through Online Asynchronous Case Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of foundational instructional design principles and educational theory
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment focusing on enhancing instructional design capabilities for mathematics curriculum integration. Pre-service and in-service teachers cultivate case analysis skills applicable to real educational settings through asynchronous discussion platforms and face-to-face workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze various instructional design cases in asynchronous discussion environments and propose application plans for core ID principles.
Learners can develop an instructional design model tailored to math subject characteristics and improve it through peer feedback.
Learners can design effective knowledge-sharing processes by utilizing collaboration strategies in online discussion environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
